ai-patthana8.34:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.34:1.1_0: Don’t give rise to the thought that relies on the support.
ai-patthana8.34:1.1_1: Nor do you take pleasure in the thought that gives rise to the support. for a reason, no cause it doesn’t arise.
ai-patthana8.34:1.1_2: Supportunities for the thought that relies on the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
ai-patthana8.34:2.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the thought that relies on the formless.
ai-patthana8.34:2.1_1: Nor do they arise dependent on the thought that relies on the support.
ai-patthana8.34:2.1_2: Supportunities for thought that relies on the thought, and the support that arise from you.
ai-patthana8.34:3.1_0: Nor do you rely on the support for the thought that arises dependent on the basis for the thought that arises.
ai-patthana8.34:3.1_1: Nor do you rely on the support for the thought that relies on the formless, no cause or reason for something.
ai-patthana8.34:3.1_2: nor Support on principle. Su relies on the thought that arises dependent on the perception of not.
ai-patthana8.34:4.1_0: For the sake of letting go of negligence ...
ai-patthana8.34:4.1_4: (This should be expanded in detail as in the previous discourse.)
